channel.title: Help to make a non-market npc be a market npc(and npc that sells things)
channel.description: i want to make an npc, lets say "santa", be able to sale and buy stuff like a storekeeper. does anyone have the codes for this so you can help me?

item.title: Help to make a non-market npc be a market npc(and npc that sells things)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

MastaRiddik:

what im trying to say is what if i want to use santa as the npc, and i happen to know that the npc number santa is 1552, if i change the 535 in the client.java and autospawn.cfg to 1552 will there be a santa there that has a shop?

Usually, sometimes you have to add addtional codes

Read full topic

item.title: Help to make a non-market npc be a market npc(and npc that sells things)
item.dc:creator: @MastaRiddik MastaRiddik
item.description:
@MastaRiddik wrote:

if im not mistaking this is where you post for help and when i do all i get is laughed at, come on guys this is what this is for if all your gonna post is “lolol” then why even waste the time, ive seen way more idiotic questions asked here and i admit it, im a noob but have a little respect for yourselfs b4 your post retarted replies such as “lolol”, that does nothing for you, it just makes me consider you as a jerkoff gayass that cant do anything for anyone even when they are asking for help in a polite manner, this dissapoinsts me and you should be ashamed… and could someone plz give my a logical answer to my simple question or something…

Read full topic
